A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie pissed me off enough to create an account here to review it.

If you thought the prequel trilogy damaged Star Wars\, TLJ ruins any kind of momentum rebuilt from The Force Awakens and especially Rogue One.

This movie ruins old favorites\, kills the best new character with no explanation\, adds about an hour of filler side story with no pay off and does not take advantage of some of the interesting setups this movie had access to but did not fully develop before cutting the threads.

Yes this movie will look successful this weekend\, but they have guaranteed that I will not see any other films related to this franchise in the theater.
